name: Employee of the Day
description:
In Employee of the Day, up to 4 players take the roles of Supermarket employees who have been transformed into animals! Given their new forms, they must travel across the multiverse into different worlds and settings to fight back the mighty H.A.M. and prove once and for all that no matter the weather, no matter the pay, our brave employees will save the day! Hopefully anyway…

Developed by CopperFist Studios, a small team of students studying Game Arts & Design at the University of Plymouth as part of one of their final year modules!

(A controller is required to play!)

Feel free to follow or contact us on Twitter! @CopperFistUK
